description: A user files a car accident claim using ClaimMate. The assistant retrieves the policy, extracts details from photos, builds a claim form, predicts approval probability, asks for confirmation, then submits the claim and returns the reference ID.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. Your job is to retrieve the customer's policy, extract incident details from images, populate a claim form, predict the likelihood of approval, and, after the user confirms, submit the claim on their behalf. Use the provided tools whenever necessary and keep the user informed at each step.
I was in a minor car accident yesterday. My policy number is XYZ123. I have photos of the damage and the police report. Please file the claim for me.
I have retrieved your policy. To extract the incident details, please provide the URLs of the photos of the vehicle damage and the police report.
